Text:
This is the where the torrent with the actual fonts is:

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3500165/THE_ULTIMATE_FONT_COLLECTION_for_MAC_OS_X_(july06rel)
Good work, miguelcampana. Sure your fontcatalog is useful. Thx.

to do this, i used this great opensource/free app called fontparade:

http://www.brightpebbles.org/fontparade

using the app, i made pdfs of all the UFCforMacOSX sets. 

i made the silly mistake of installing ALL of the sets, and then had to go through the painfully slow process of uninstalling them cuz it slowed my lappy down so much, with many hangs and tears... ;-)

anyway, that taught me that it's better to SEE and then SELECT the fonts before hand and install only the ones you really like or need.

good to know that people are diggin' it!
Miguel, this is AMAZING and so useful!  Kudos!  Thank you much!

Thanks Buddy! Very nice of you.....
the link to the actual fonts is great, i'm gonna enjoy using the catalogue =D
The font Bureau collection misses out on Mantinia and Sophia! Those 2 are my favourites.
Could anyone inform if the entire family of Griffith Gothic from Font Bureau is included, please, please, please
Thank you so much for taking the time to do this! It was very thoughtful of you. Much appreciated!
